["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"安装脚本","children":"安装脚本"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"LLVM 版本","items":[["默认",{"version":""}],["15",{"version":"15"}],["14",{"version":"14"}],["13",{"version":"13"}],["12",{"version":"12"}],["11",{"version":"11"}]]}],"code":"# 下载脚本
wget {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/llvm.sh
chmod +x llvm.sh
{{sudo}}./llvm.sh {{version}} all -m {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"手动启用","children":"手动启用"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["首先信任来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://apt.llvm.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://apt.llvm.org/"}]," 的 PGP 公钥："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm-snapshot.gpg.key | {{sudo}}apt-key add -","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新增 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm-apt.list"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm-apt.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 12",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"release_name":"bionic"}]]},{"title":"LLVM 版本","items":[["默认",{"version":""}],["16",{"version":"-16"}],["15",{"version":"-15"}],["14",{"version":"-14"}],["13",{"version":"-13"}],["12",{"version":"-12"}],["11",{"version":"-11"}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{release_name}}/ llvm-toolchain-{{release_name}}{{version}} main
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{release_name}}/ llvm-toolchain-{{release_name}}{{version}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}]]}]

meta.title: LLVM APT 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
